properties.areaDesc: Newton, MO; Lawrence, MO; Barry, MO
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 10 at 3:48PM CST until January 10 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northeastern Newton County in southwestern Missouri...
Northwestern Barry County in southwestern Missouri...
Western Lawrence County in southwestern Missouri...

* Until 415 PM CST.

* At 347 PM CST, severe thunderstorms capable of producing a tornado
were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of
Sarcoxie to near Pierce City to 6 miles west of Monett to near
Fairview, moving northeast at 35 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* Locations impacted include...
Monett...                         Mount Vernon...
Pierce City...                    Miller...
Stotts City...                    Freistatt...
Wentworth...                      Hoberg...

This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 33 and 45.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 4:15 PM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
